body.name: Sam’s Natural Deodorant - Original - Aluminum Free DEO - No phthalates, parabens, sulfates, or dyes - Made in New Hampshire - For Men, Women, Unisex - Vegan, Cruelty Free - 3 oz
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 2 hrs 11 mins
features: ORIGINAL SCENT - This subtle spiced mahogany scent is infused with soft notes of creamy vanilla for a burst of freshness to your underarms. A perfect first choice for switching to a natural deodorant. Scented with Fragrance Oil.

ALUMINUM-FREE, LONG-LASTING, HARDWORKING & ECO-FRIENDLY - Also free of phthalates, parabens, sulfates, and dyes. People LOVE our deodorants because they work naturally to leave you smelling fresh all day long! Certified Vegan and Cruelty-Free. Packaged in 100% recyclable plastic tubes.

HOW TO APPLY – A little bit goes a long way! Resist the urge to over apply, 1-2 light swipes is all you need. Over application is a common mistake which may cause a minor rash. If this occurs, we recommend reducing the application amount or discontinuing use. A small percentage of people may simply be sensitive to the ingredients in our product and unable to wear any amount; the most common being baking soda.
MADE IN NEW HAMPSHIRE - All Sam's Natural products are made in small batches at our facility in Atkinson, NH.

HASSLE-FREE RETURNS – Not only do we make excellent, hardworking products but our customer service is hardworking too! If you are dissatisfied for any reason, we offer returns with a full refund within 30 days from date of purchase.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Sam's Natural was founded on our Hard Workin' Walnut Husk Hand Scrub, born out of necessity to clean, deodorize, and soften hard working hands without the use of harsh chemicals. Today we are proud to be a leader in the natural deodorant market and offer a full line of natural, vegan and cruelty-free personal care products. Every product is formulated using premium natural ingredients sourced from trusted American suppliers and handcrafted by our passionate team in Atkinson, NH.
OUR MISSION IS TO DEVELOP INNOVATIVE, NATURAL PERSONAL CARE PRODUCTS THAT SOLVE EVERYDAY PROBLEMS, EMPLOY AMAZING PEOPLE AND ADD VALUE TO THE LIVES OF OUR ECO-CONSCIOUS AND GLOBALLY-MINDED COMMUNITY.

Sam's Natural Deodorant Original Our ORIGINAL deodorant has a subtle spiced mahogany scent infused with soft notes of creamy vanilla for a burst of freshness to your underarms. Scented with fragrance oil. Please note: our natural deodorants are not antiperspirants and will not prevent sweating which is a natural function of the body. Ingredients: sodium bicarbonate, coconut oil, candelilla wax, arrowroot powder, MCT oil, pumpkinseed oil, shea butter, rosemary leaf extract, carrot seed essential oil, tea tree essential oil, aloe vera leaf extract, vitamin e, aspen bark extract, fragrance.
Sam's Natural Deodorant Key Features Incredibly Effective Odor ProtectionLong-Lasting 3 oz TubeAluminum-FreeNo ParabensNo SulfatesNo Artificial ColorsVeganCruelty-Free17 Intriguing Scents

An Easy Way to Go Natural Our natural deodorants are powered by plant-derived ingredients and designed for everyday life. Whether it’s a lazy Sunday or an active weekday, you can stay confident with a natural deodorant that really works! Some folks experience a brief transition period when switching from a commercial deodorant to a natural deodorant. This may cause a temporary increase in sweat, body odor, or sensitivity. Be patient, this transition is usually only a few days to a week and the payoff is well worth it.

How to Apply We know it’s tempting, but resist the urge to over apply; a little goes a long way with our natural deodorants and 1-2 light swipes is really all you need. Over application could cause irritation due to the baking soda in our formula. If this happens, we recommend reducing your usage amount or discontinuing use. Some folks may simply be sensitive to one or more of the ingredients in our natural deodorant and unable to use any amount. Directions for Use: Please take extra care when using our natural deodorants. Vigorously clean areas prior to applying this deodorant. Apply gently to dry, clean areas with 1-2 passes. Do not apply with excessive pressure. Spot test prior to use. Discontinue use if irritation occurs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Kills odor whole day, easy to use, lasts for months.
reviews.reviewText: This deo has an ideal thickness to be used as a deodorant. It isn't too soft an it isn't hardMy skin didn't give any reactions to it. It doesn't give any feeling after I apply it. Nothing slippery or dry. It is like it isn't there.It does the job to get rid of the bad smell all day. I didn't take the risk of not applying it the second day.It lasts for a long time. It doesn't spread all over its container and bother me. The mechanism also works fine and easy to use it.Didn't take it on a plane, I don't know its airport security performance.I used this one and the original one so far. Both smell I didn't like by any means. I gave this one away and using the original one. I hope I can find one with a fresh and soapy smell. The original has a smell like a pine resin. This one smells more acidic. Has nothing to do with aloe vera. But they both do the job so I surely will keep using this brand.Please don't risk your life by using antiperspirant chemicals and support these guys. Also someone with experience in gathering a good smelling mix, please give a hand to these guys, they are pretty much better than good with the rest of the objectives they need to achieve.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best natural deodorant available and love the scent variety!
reviews.reviewText: This deodorant is the best natural deodorant i’ve ever bought. Over the past year and a half, i have tried every scent they make, except for Sport. The first few time’s i ordered through Amazon, i received the product with broken tops, and have never received a single response from the company. However, i like the product so much, that i ordered many more, and most of them have been fine. The “cigar” scent, smells like a fresh cigar (unlit). The Aloe is fresh cut.. clean smelling, perfect for summer. One of my favorite’s is the, only occasionally available, coconut. It smells exactly like the Hawaiian sun tan lotion from when i was a kid. Love it! The “Bay” scent.. smells like you just went to the barber shop for a hair cut. Leather.. scent.. smells NOT like a watch band, but instead.. like leather from the leather shop (however the smell changes within a few hours to one i didn’t like). The same with Vetiver .. at first.. it smells like your sitting around a campfire and brings back awesome memories.. however.. within an hour or two.. it begins to smell like an electrical fire (really strange and gross). The oak moss has a nice “woodsy” smell to it and is nice for daily wear. However.. bar none.. my favorite.. is Cederwood. It smells like fresh cut cedar when you put it on.. and throughout the day. Never had to “reapply” the cederwood either. Chestnut is also pretty good.. smells like the interior of an old hotrod.. if you’ve ever owned a classic car.. you’ll know what I mean. Original scent smells like the original “right gaurd”… As for “sage lime”.. it smells clean and summery at first, but is not that good within a few hours.Basically.. as far as natural deoderant’s are concerned. This company’s products actually smell like the name implies (unlike other companies attempts). They have a large selection for men, woman, other(s). They last all day without needing to be reapplied..My only advice is to take the companies advice… apply with one swipe up, and one swipe down the other side.. another words “less is more”.. if you over apply.. it will burn .. leave stains.. or cause trouble. Adding more.. will NOT make it work better, or last longer. On average. A container last me a few months because of how thin you apply it. If your switching from an anti-persperant to this product, it will take a few days for your body to adjust. You can also do this… if you take a shower at night… you can use an anti-perperant (especially an unscented one.. if done this on the hottest days of the summer), and the next morning.. after showering, apply Sams (the scent you love the most). This will make you sweat less during the worst summer days, while still using the scent you love the most. I’ve only needed to do this a few times in a year. I used another product, which is a pad containing simply the anti-persperant (called sweat block; which last up to seven days and is unscented), and then used Sam’s as normal; during 100 degree days. Even on day’s that are in the eighties and nineties.. Sam’s works fine on it’s own.As for staining… i’ve only had one Sam’s product cause stains.. and that was the Coconut one. Because it has coconut oil i assume.. this one caused problems. However, for the most part, Sam’s washes out of clothing very well.Summary: I have tried numerous “natural” deodorants.. and Sam’s in bar none.. the best. It smells like the name implies.. last longer than other “natural” deodorant’s.. doesn’t stain clothing (except for the one i mentioned). And, even though it is expensive.. you put it on so thinly.. that it lasts as long as any other deodorant you might buy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2018
reviews.reviewText: *EDIT* (2/22/18)After use for about a month I need to amend my review of this product. While I still am using it and like how it works, I have had mild irritation that will not go away. I don't know if it is an ingredient or what the cause is. Both underarms right in where the arm meets the torso has a small rash in that area. It isn't really all that noticable unless I look at it but still there. I do have sensitive skin so that might be the cause, but the odd thing is that it is not everywhere I use the deodorant. I use one swipe top to bottom, but that isn't where the irritation occurs, so I am not totally sure the cause. I still would recommend this product, but felt the need to update the review. I also have taken one star off for this, and will replace if I can figure out the exact cause and that it isn't caused by this product.*EDIT*I have to say I am pleasantly surprised by this deodorant! The scent is awesome and works perfectly with my other products that I use. (beardbalm, cologne, ect.) I have been using aluminium free deodorant for a while so I didn't have to worry about the "adjustment" period which was nice. I will say that if I put more than one swipe on, that I have seen some irritation occur. Other than that this deodorant works really well. I can go a full 24 hrs without starting to smell at all, much better than the 6 hrs from my last deodorant. Overall I would recommend this product to anyone looking for a better product that works and offers a nice variety of scents to choose from!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It works! No rash, clean and fresh, lasts all day.
reviews.reviewText: I've used a lot of natural deodorants. Most don't really work for me, at least by the end of the day they start to fail. Sam's works! All day, no issues. It goes on pretty dry. Took me a bit to get accustomed to applying it - it has a fairly high amount of baking soda so is a bit gritty going on. But it absorbs quickly leaving clean and dry skin, no mess and nothing left to stain clothing. I got the patchouli scent, which I love. The scent is subtle, not over-powering. I also have fairly sensitive skin. A lot of deodorant products give me a rash. I had no rash issues with Sam's. I think next time I'll try the cedar, which I'm seeing good reviews about. :)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on June 15, 2019
reviews.reviewText: WORKS AMAZING SIMPLY THE BEST NATURAL ONE I EVER USED!! I STAY DRY ALL DAY, WOULD BUY AGAIN,,
I like it very muchWill order again soonExcellent quality
